the short answer is that YouTube
disabled the comment feature on my
channel a number of years ago some sick
individuals were leaving very
inappropriate comments on channels and
videos that feature children and so
YouTube disabled comments on all videos
and all channels that feature children
and my channel was affected by this
policy however I realized that this was
a big blessing in disguise first off I
was spending almost an hour a day
admitting and monitoring the comments on
my YouTube videos it's just something
that had to be done because of the
amount of spam and inappropriate
comments that people would leave so
suddenly I had an extra hour a day to
worry about making better videos and not
dealing with comments the other thing I
realized was that only point three
percent of the people who watch my
videos were leaving comments so turning
off comments was really only affecting a
very small percentage of my audience and
since comments are disabled I just worry
a lot less about what people think or
what people are going to say and I just
focus on making better videos and my
